subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The closers have been lightly used, five games have been decided by at least five runs and now everything will be on the line for the Royals and the Giants on Wednesday night in Game 7.
snippet: The closers have been lightly used, five games have been decided by at least five runs and now everything will be on the line for the Royals and the Giants on Wednesday night in Game 7.
